snapshot_info.narration_text: Pick up another handful of cheese using the right hand from the plate of grated cheese that's being held using the left hand.

zone_lower_shelf_of_the_door_of_the_frid.name: lower shelf of the door of the fridge

put down the milk bottle
Hold the mesh containing oranges using the left hand to free the space to cut it open. Using the right hand, open the scissors and cut the mesh to open it.
place orange

Grind and pour pepper from the jar into the pan by holding the jar with the right hand, holding the top cylinder with the left hand and rotating these in opposite directions multiple times to pour to grind and pour the pepper.
shake the jar
continue to grind and pour the pepper from the jar by holding the top cylinder and the jar using opposite hands and moving these, rotating these in circular fashion in opposite directions

Stir the content of the pan, the butter and the ground pepper together using the spatula held in the right hand.

Dip the ladle in the pan containing boiling water with pasta to get some of the starch liquid for cooking the sauce. Filling most of the ladle using the water without adding any of the pasta pieces.
take a handful of cheese
throw the handful of cheese
stir the added cheese into the pasta sauce, which contains hot water, butter and black pepper, allowing the cheese to mix with the sauce and melt. mixing is done in quick, small, circular motions
